page.title: 01BERKELEY POWER STATION AREA
page.content: The area around{Berkeley Power Station is not only of interest beacause of its{nuclear}power station, but also because it contains the great {River Severn}and many other related natural and man-made features. The area is a{flood plain}and so has very fertile soil, which is chiefly used to grow grass for{dairy cattle. This country area has a small number of people, some living on{farms}and others on a{caravan site}which is situated on the outskirts of the nearby town of Berkeley. Apart from{electricity generation}and {farming}the other industry in the area is centred around an old{flour mill. Recreational activities in the area itself include{mink hunting, fishing, and use of the{power station sports {club. }
